entry.title: Octopress: The Blogging Engine for Hackers
entry.content:
First Post

Well, here I am trying out Octopress. I guess it's time for me to finally join the 21st century and learn MarkDown. I'm sure my webs will be clearer if I do.

I'm listening to the Aquaria soundtrack. I've only recently discovered video game soundtracks. I still feel pretty nerdy for liking them, but as my buddy @brettcsmith keeps pointing out to me, they're sort of the perfect thing when you want something to fill your head but not distract you. It's what they're designed for.

I seem to be having a problem with this thing generating a .markdown/index.html version of my posts, which is pretty clearly wrong, in a moral sense.
